archimate:Resource.name: Data Consolidator
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB is responsible for extracting relevant information from sources, transforming the information into the appropriate integrated form, and loading the information into the target repository. This ABB supports Extract-Transform-Load (ETL) from one or more source systems into a target system. It is also responsible for supporting real-time ETL capabilities with the initial or incremental ETL of volume data into a target repository (e.g., data warehouse or master data repository).
